column4: I'm on ubuntu 9.10 and the update tool is telling me there is a new dkms package available but if I say to install that update it wants me to insert the CD for 11.04. That seems like the wrong version of a package was put in to the updates area for 9.10
the updates haven't stopped or else it wouldn't say there is an update for dmks
that's how it is, get over it
